title: Fps below 144 when locked, over 400 while uncapped
body:
I have this problem for like a month, maybe two. Got a gtx 1080 and all other parts way above what league needs to run properly. Always had to lock my frames, because getting above 400 makes the game unplayable with teleporting champions. Not a problem tho, locked my fps at 144 and played without any complications whatsoever. Unfortunately, since 2-3 patches, my fps fluctuate from 140 to 142 while capped at 144, while still being above 400 when I unlock them. Not like it is a deal breaker, doesn't really affect the game much, but hell if it doesn't bother me anyways. Any ideas what might be causing it?

Deile

replies.body: Those teleporting champions are a pretty good sign that your network might be having troubles with packet loss. Essentially, packet loss happens when some of the data coming from your network gets lost or damaged before it reaches our servers. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with the network logs of that game that lagged so bad. Take a screenshot, and post it over here for us to go over together!

[link](https://scontent-frx5-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t35.0-12/19840227_1355296151233693_597920537_o.png?oh=f90540e21cae5cf98c9841443736d74c&oe=59663B85)
These slightly teleporting champions are not the problem here, fps going crazy while being locked at 144 would be the main issue.

Deile
